text:
In what seems to be an attempt to leverage the national/anti-national debate in the wake of the JNU controversy, the State unit of the Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP), the student wing of the RSS, is set to hold a symposium to explain to the people what transpired at the University.

BJP sources said the symposium, to be held in Chennai on Saturday, will see ABVP leaders involved in the fiasco talking about the events that led to the police action against research scholar Kanhaiya Kumar.

The move seems to be retaliation to the Left parties’ plans to use Mr. Kumar during elections campaigns in the States going to polls.
title: ABVP meet on JNU row
